com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget
Class DataView

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.UIObject
      com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget
          com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.Component
              com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.BoxComponent
                  com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.DataView
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener
public class DataView
extends BoxComponent

A mechanism for displaying data using custom layout templates. DataView uses an Template as its internal templating mechanism.

The view also provides built-in behavior for many common events that can occur for its contained items including Click, DoubleClick, MouseOver, MouseOut, etc. as well as a built-in selection model. In order to use these features, an itemSelector config must be provided for the DataView to determine what nodes it will be working with.

Events:
BeforeSelect : DataViewEvent(view, index, element, event)
Fires before a click is processed. Listeners can set the doit field to false to cancel the action.
  • view : this
  • index : the index of the target node
  • element : the target node
  • event : the dom event
Select : DataViewEvent(view, index, element, event)
Fires when a template node is selected.
  • view : this
  • index : the index of the target node
  • element : the target node
  • event : the dom event
Click : DataViewEvent(view, event)
Fires when a template node is clicked.
  • view : this
  • event : the dom event
ContainerClick : DataViewEvent(view, event)
Fires when a click occurs and it is not on a template node.
  • view : this
  • event : the dom event
DoubleClick : DataViewEvent(view, index, element, event)
Fires when a template node is double clicked.
  • view : this
  • index : the index of the target node
  • element : the target nodet
  • event : the dom event
ContextMenu : DataViewEvent(view, index, element, event)
Fires when a template node is right clicked.
  • view : this
  • index : the index of the target node
  • element : the target node
  • event : the dom event
BeforeSelect : DataViewEvent(view, elements)
Fires before a selection is made. Listeners can set the doit field to false to cancel the action.
  • view : this
  • elements : the selected nodes
SelectChange : DataViewEvent(view)
Fires when the selected nodes change.
  • view : this

Field Detail

containerStyle

public java.lang.String containerStyle
The container style name (defaults to 'x-view').

itemSelector

public java.lang.String itemSelector
This is a required setting. A simple CSS selector (e.g. div.some-class or span:first-child) that will be used to determine what nodes this DataView will be working with (defaults to 'x-view-item').

overStyle

public java.lang.String overStyle
The style name to apply on mouse over (defaults to 'x-view-item-over').

selectStyle

public java.lang.String selectStyle
The style to be applied to each selected item (defaults to 'x-view-item-sel').

selectionMode

public DataView.ViewSelectionMode selectionMode
Sets the selection mode (defaults to SINGLE).

Valid values are:

  • SINGLE - single selection
  • MULTI - multi selection
  • SIMPLE - multiselection by clicking on multiple items without requiring the user to hold Shift or Ctrl, false to force the user to hold Ctrl or Shift to select more than on item

selectOnHover

public boolean selectOnHover
True to select the item when mousing over a element (defaults to false).

defaultTemplate

public java.lang.String defaultTemplate
The default HTML frament to be used if no template is specified.

onComponentEvent

public void onComponentEvent(ComponentEvent ce)
Description copied from class: Component
Any events a component receives will be forwarded to this method. Subclasses should override as needed. The Component.onBrowserEvent(com.google.gwt.user.client.Event) method should not be overridden or modified.

Overrides:
